start.text: Great! What kind of service are you looking for?

Optimization_type.text: Cool! Which type of Optimization do you want ?

App_type.text: Cool! What type of APP do you want ?

Porting_type.text: To move ahead, please answer a few questions related to porting.

Porting_question_1.text: On which target the audio algorithm is running?

Porting_question_2.text: Is there a requirenment for Cross Compliance?

DSP_Processor.text: Got it. Now, which type of processor do you need?

Application.text: Cool! What type of application do you want ?

Audio_Interface.text: Understood. Which type of audio interface do you want?

Algo_req.text: Great! Please answer a few questions for Specific Requirenment.

Requirenment_question_1.text: What will be the Sample Rate?

Requirenment_question_2.text: What will be the Bit Depth?

Requirenment_question_3.text: What will be the Sample Size?

Requirenment_question_4.text: What will be the Block Size(Per processor)?

final_step.text: Awesome! Your requirements have been noted down. Please review your summary before we proceed further.

make_changes.text: Please enter the number of the question you'd like to change (e.g., 1, 2, 3).

await_new_answer.text: Please enter your new answer for the selected question:

show_updated_summary.text:
Got it! I've updated your requirements based on your changes.

Hereâ€™s your updated summary:

{{updated_summary}}

Would you like to proceed?

submit_response.text: Thank you! Your requirements have been successfully submitted. Our team will get back to you shortly.

end.text: No problem! You can start again anytime by saying 'Try your service'.
